metadescription: Automate real-time stock sentiment from X/Instagram: AI scores buy/sell intent and urgency, then creates Asana tasks and Slack alerts. Learn more.
summary:
Real-time webhook turns any stock/sector/event query into a social sentiment scan across X (Twitter) and Instagram.  
AI detects intent (buy/sell/fear/opportunity) and scores sentiment, urgency, and signal strength for fast triage.  
Insights are auto-shaped into operations-ready outputs: a prioritized Asana task plus a crisp, leadership-friendly Slack alert.  
Validation, safe JSON parsing, and a dedicated error-to-Slack handler keep execution reliable and debuggable.  
Built for self-hosted n8n only, powered by OpenAI/Azure OpenAI + MCP social intelligence, with Asana and Slack integrations.
